record.id: field.name="max.level.relation.search" and file.name="environment" and term=NULL and format.name="environment.icm.g" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: max.level.relation.search
record.file.name: environment
record.format.name: environment.icm.g

brief.brief: The maxium level of downstream CIs to retrieve when you click the “Show Members” button from a CI record of the “Business Service” or “CI Group” type.

detail.detail: For example, a business service email could have 3 children, and each of its children can have 3 children. If this field is set to 1, the “Show Members” option will only retrieve 3 children; if the level is set to 2, the “Show Members” option will retrieve its 3 immediate children, plus the 9 grandchildren.
